label: A2BC2_hR5_166_c_a_c-002
title: Tetradymite (Bi$_{2}$Te$_{2}$S, $C33$) Structure
comments:
This is the ternary form of \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B3_hR5_166_c_ac-001}{Bi$_{2}$Te$_{3}$}, {\em Strukturbericht} symbol $C33$. It was the original $C33$ structure assigned by (Gottfried, 1937), but we decided to use the binary form as the designated structure. 
 Hexagonal settings for rhombohedral structures can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
